post:
[LayerOnline](http://www.layeronline.com) is dedicated to provide high quality [VPS hosting](http://www.layeronline.com), [dedicated servers](http://www.layeronline.com), [web hosting](http://www.layeronline.com) and [domain name](http://www.layeronline.com) services. We offer VPS hosting in Europe and US.

Feature of our VPS Hosting:

* Powerful Intel Processors
* Top Tier Network
* Highly Available Infrastructure
* RAID Protected Storage
* DDOS Protection
* Wide Selection of Linux OS
* Container for WordPress and 300+ Scripts
* Free Backup
* Modern Bootstrap Interface
* IPv4 + IPv6
* Clean IPs
* Top Notch Support

LET exclusive:

* 1 vCPU core
* 1GB RAM
* 10GB SSD
* 2TB BW
* Free DDOS Protection
* $7/m [Order](https://www.layeronline.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=190)

Need Windows or more power? Want to fully customize your VPS? Check out our website for more options.

Please note that traffic exchange is not permitted on our VPS Hosting.
